docs.text:
PDMP.jl User Guide




Introduction


The aim of this package is to provide a flexible and expandable framework for 
Piecewise Deterministic Markov Processes
 and their application in Bayesian computations. See 
the references
.




References




Alexandre Bouchard-Côté, Sebastian J. Vollmer and Arnaud Doucet, 
The Bouncy Particle Sampler: A Non-Reversible Rejection-Free Markov Chain Monte Carlo Method
 (preprint, 2015)


Joris Bierkens, Alexandre Bouchard-Côté, Arnaud Doucet, Andrew B. Duncan, Paul Fearnhead, Gareth Roberts and Sebastian J. Vollmer, 
Piecewise Deterministic Markov Processes for Scalable Monte Carlo on Restricted Domains
 (preprint, 2017)


Joris Bierkens, Paul Fearnhead and Gareth Roberts, 
The Zig-Zag Process and Super-Efficient Sampling for Bayesian Analysis of Big Data
 (preprint, 2016)
